sentences.en: Dodos are flightless birds from the late Holocene.
sentences.cn: 渡渡鸟是全新世晚期不会飞翔的鸟类.

sentences.en: On the influence of land cover on early Holocene climate in northern latitudes.
sentences.cn: 陆地覆盖对北纬地区早期全新世气候的影响.

sentences.en: The priciple of cyclic sedimentation applies to deposits dating from earliest Paleozoic time to the Holocene.
sentences.cn: 旋回沉积原理适用于始于最早的古生代迄至全新世的沉积物.

sentences.en: There are disputes on transgression and high sea level in academe since holocene.
sentences.cn: 全新世以来海侵及高海面问题在学术界存在着争议.

trans.tran_cn: （地）全新世（的），全新统（的），全新纪

trans.tran_en: the Holocene epoch or rock series
